dict.acceptation: 勘探；勘察；（矿等）有希望；有前途；

sent.orig: It has been pointed out that electrophoretic deposition a wide applitcation prospect in the meterials field.
sent.trans: 电泳电沉积在材料领域具有广阔的发展前景。

sent.orig: Therefore, development prospect of conventional fire-retardant fibers, fire retardant and fire proofing methods are forecasted reasonably.
sent.trans: 并合理预测了常规阻燃纤维、阻燃剂和织物阻燃整理方法的发展趋势。

sent.orig: Lets a closer look at the three possible types of language a prospect might use.
sent.trans: 让我们来仔细观察一下潜在顾客可能会使用的三种语言模式。

sent.orig: In its early days, Hong Kong was regarded as an uninviting prospect for settlement.
sent.trans: 最初人们认为香港并不是一个安居乐业的好地方。

sent.orig: That argument is correct, in that businesses need the prospect of profit in order to invest.
sent.trans: 这种说法是正确的，因为商业只有在有利可图时才会有投资。
